args.natural_language_statement: Every order topology is regular: For any linear_order α with the order topology (OrderTopology α), the topological space α is regular. More formally: For any type α with [LinearOrder α] and [TopologicalSpace α] and [OrderTopology α], we have RegularSpace α := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Every order topology is regular. -/
theorem order_topology_regular {α : Type _} [TopologicalSpace α] [Preorder α] [OrderTopology α] :
  RegularSpace α := by sorry
